title: Before and after you leave Australia
summary: This page provides information for people leaving Australia, including tax implications of selling property, assistance programs, avoiding conflict zones, and accessing superannuation after departure. It explains eligibility for the Departing Australia Superannuation Payment (DASP) and the steps required to claim it.

cgt_main_residence_exemption.previous_rule: Foreign residents who had been Australian residents could claim the CGT main residence exemption before 9 May 2017.
